reviews.review_msg: Dr Sharma gets a lot of unwarranted hate, but it is undeserved. He is clear, gives great lectures-although the textbook is all you need if you don't want to go-, is always there to give help, and is passionate about teaching. My advice is to practise every question you can, as you need to understand why the calculations are made. Just study hard.
doesn't speak english very well but his helpfulness really makes up for that.  goes really far for his students as well.  pretty easy when compared with other 2nd year classes

he's been very helpful - he does try hard to teach well. does have an accent and is often incomprehensible but you get used to it in about 2 weeks into the semester.  sometimes rushes through concepts too fast.  though a pretty easy class so far.
Teacher was horrible. Guy can barely speak english and doesn't not care about students at all. Notes are really hard to understand. Avoid this guy!
